languages.text: "Когда исполнишь это... собери верных и принеси их в жертву. Третий удар откроет путь к финалу. Темный город станет уязвим, а ты... ты проложишь дорогу в реальный мир".

traits.locale_text: "Когда исполнишь это... собери верных и принеси их в жертву. Третий удар откроет путь к финалу. Темный город станет уязвим, а ты... ты проложишь дорогу в реальный мир".
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

languages.text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."
languages.original_text: "Когда исполнишь это... собери верных и принеси их в жертву. Третий удар откроет путь к финалу. Темный город станет уязвим, а ты... ты проложишь дорогу в реальный мир".

traits.locale_text: "Once you have completed this task, gather the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless, and you... you will have your road to realspace."
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

traits.locale_text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

languages.text: 「この任務を完了したら、信者を召喚し、生け贄として捧げるのだ。第三の攻撃はフィナーレへの道を明らかにする。仄暗き都は無防備になり、あなたは…あなたはリアルスペースへの道を手に入れるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."

traits.locale_text: 「この任務を完了したら、信者を召喚し、生け贄として捧げるのだ。第三の攻撃はフィナーレへの道を明らかにする。仄暗き都は無防備になり、あなたは…あなたはリアルスペースへの道を手に入れるだろう」
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

languages.text: “这件事情办好之后，召唤虔诚之人，将他们献为祭品。第三次攻击会为你揭开最后的道路，黑暗之城会变得不堪一击，而你……你会找到回到真实世界的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情办好之后，召唤虔诚之人，将他们献为祭品。第三次攻击会为你揭开最后的道路，黑暗之城会变得不堪一击，而你……你会找到回到真实世界的道路。”
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

languages.text: «Una vez que hayas completado esta tarea, convoca a los fieles y ofrécelos como sacrificio. El tercer golpe revelará el camino hacia el final. La Ciudad Siniestra quedará indefensa, y tú... tendrás tu camino hacia el espacio real».
languages.original_text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez que hayas completado esta tarea, convoca a los fieles y ofrécelos como sacrificio. El tercer golpe revelará el camino hacia el final. La Ciudad Siniestra quedará indefensa, y tú... tendrás tu camino hacia el espacio real».
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr diese Aufgabe abgeschlossen habt, ruft die Gläubigen zusammen und bietet sie als Opfer dar. Der dritte Schlag offenbart den Weg zum Finale. Die Dunkle Stadt wird wehrlos sein und Euch ... Euch öffnet sich der Weg in den Realraum."
languages.original_text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr diese Aufgabe abgeschlossen habt, ruft die Gläubigen zusammen und bietet sie als Opfer dar. Der dritte Schlag offenbart den Weg zum Finale. Die Dunkle Stadt wird wehrlos sein und Euch ... Euch öffnet sich der Weg in den Realraum."
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

languages.text: « Une fois cette tâche accomplie, invoquez le fidèle et offrez-le en sacrifice. Le troisième coup révélera la voie vers le grand final. La Cité Crépusculaire sera alors sans défense, et vous... vous pourrez rejoindre l'espace réel. »
languages.original_text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois cette tâche accomplie, invoquez le fidèle et offrez-le en sacrifice. Le troisième coup révélera la voie vers le grand final. La Cité Crépusculaire sera alors sans défense, et vous... vous pourrez rejoindre l'espace réel. »
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror

languages.text: "Bu görevi yerine getirdikten sonra inananları çağırıp onları kurban olarak sun. Üçüncü saldırı, sona uzanan yolu açık edecek. Kara Şehir savunmasız kalacak ve sen... Sen de gerçekuzaya giden yoluna kavuşacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Once you have completed this task, summon the faithful and offer them as sacrifice. The third strike will reveal the way to the finale. The Dark City will be rendered defenceless and you... you will have your road to realspace."

traits.locale_text: "Bu görevi yerine getirdikten sonra inananları çağır ve onları kurban olarak sun. Üçüncü saldırı, sona uzanan yolu açık edecek. Kara Şehir savunmasız kalacak ve sen... Sen de gerçekuzaya giden bir yola kavuşacaksın."
traits.speaker: RE_Hold_PinkHorror
